00003 inline _zgematrix operator+(const _zhematrix& matA, const _zgematrix& matB)
00004 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00005 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00006   if(matA.n!=matB.n || matA.n!=matB.m){
00007     ERROR_REPORT;
00008     std::cerr << "These two matrises can not make a summation." << std::endl
00009               << "Your input was (" << matA.n << "x" << matA.n << ") + (" << matB.m << "x" << matB.n << ")." << std::endl;
00010     exit(1);
00011   }
00012 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00013   
00014   for(long i=0; i<matA.n; i++){ for(long j=0; j<matA.n; j++){
00015     matB(i,j)+=matA(i,j);
00016   }}
00017   
00018   matA.destroy();
00019   return matB;
00020 }
